description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a horse or horse-human hybrid. When consumed by Pierre, a bird, it creates a unique pegasus-like form combining bird and horse characteristics.

users.circumstances: Pierre, Gan Fall's Sky Dot Bird companion, consumed the Uma Uma no Mi at some point before Episode 153. The exact timing is unknown.

abilityReveals.description: The user can transform into a full horse or a horse-human hybrid. When used by a bird like Pierre, it creates a pegasus-like creature with wings.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Gan Fall demonstrates Pierre's transformation ability to the Straw Hats, showing how the bird can become a pegasus.

abilityReveals.description: The horse form provides enhanced strength and carrying capacity, though Pierre could already carry Gan Fall in his bird form.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Pierre serves as Gan Fall's mount in both forms.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: When consumed by an animal, the Zoan fruit creates interesting hybrid forms. Pierre's bird-horse combination allows for a flying horse (pegasus) form.
Like all Zoan fruits, provides access to base form, hybrid form, and full transformation.
